titleStmt.title: A list of the imperial forces in the kingdom of Hungary, in the year 1686. and 1687. As also of the Turks army, (and Tartars) under the command of Soliman Azen, Grand Vizier.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Croom, in Thames-street,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: sheet creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
